Verses: 1 en Belanaagiya Karththaave, Ummil Anbukooruven.
2 karththar En Kanmalaiyum, En Kottaiyum, En Ratchagarum, En Dhevanum, Naan Nambiyirukkira En Thurugamum, En Kedagamum, En Ratchaniyak Kombum, En Uyarndha Adaikkalamumaayirukkiraar.
3 thuthikkup Paaththiraraagiya Karththarai Nokkik Kooppiduven; Adhanaal En Saththurukkalukku Neengalaagi Ratchikkappaduven.
4 maranakkattugal Ennaich Sutrikkondadhu; Thurchchanappiravaagam Ennaip Bayappaduththinadhu.
5 paadhaalakkattugal Ennai Soozhndhukondadhu; Maranakkannigal Enmel Vizhundhadhu.

6 enakku Undaana Nerukkaththile Karththarai Nokkik Kooppittu, En Dhevanai Nokki Abayamitten; Thamadhu Aalayaththilirundhu En Saththaththaik Kettaar, En Kooppiduthal Avar Sannidhiyil Poi, Avar Sevigalil Eritru.
7 appozhudhu Boomi Asaindhu Adhirndhadhu, Avar Kobangondapadiyaal Parvadhangalin Asthipaarangal Kulungi Asaindhadhu.
8 avar Naasiyilirundhu Pugai Ezhumpitru, Avar Vaayilirundhu Patchikkira Akkini Purappattadhu; Adhanaal Thazhal Moondadhu.
9 vaanangalaith Thaazhththi Iranginaar; Avar Paadhangalinkeezh Kaarirul Irundhadhu.
10 kerupeenmel Eri Vegamaai Sendraar; Kaatrin Settaigalaikkondu Parandhaar.
11 irulaith Thamakku Maraividamaakkinaar; Karumpunalgalaiyum, Aagaayaththuk Kaarmegangalaiyum Thammai Soozhak Koodaaramaakkinaar.
12 avarudaiya Sannidhip Piragaasaththinaal Avarudaiya Megangal Parandhu Vilagitru, Kalmazhaiyum Neruppuththazhalum Vizhundhadhu.
13 karththar Vaanangalile Kumurinaar, Unnadhamaanavar Thamadhu Saththaththaith Dhonikkappanninaar; Kalmazhaiyum Neruppuththazhalum Vizhundhadhu.
14 thammudaiya Ambugalai Eydhu, Avargalai Sitharatiththaar; Minnalgalaip Pirayokiththu, Avargalaik Kalangappanninaar.
15 appozhudhu Karththaave, Ummudaiya Kandidhaththinaalum Ummudaiya Naasiyin Suvaasakkaatrinaalum Thanneergalin Madhagukal Thiravundu, Poodhalaththin Asthipaarangal Kaanappattadhu.
16 uyaraththilirundhu Avar Kaineetti, Ennaip Pidiththu, Jalappiravaakaththilirukkira Ennaith Thookkivittaar.
17 ennilum Adhiga Balavaangalaayirundha En Balaththa Saththuruvukkum Ennaip Pagaikkiravargalukkum Ennai Viduviththaar.
18 en Aabaththunaalil Enakku Edhirittu Vandhaargal; Karththaro Enakku Aadharavaayirundhaar.
19 avar Visaalamaana Idaththile Ennaik Konduvandhu, Enmel Piriyamaayirundhapadiyaal, Ennaith Thappuviththaar.
20 karththar En Needhikkuththakkadhaaga Enakkup Badhilaliththaar; En Kaigalin Suththaththirkuththakkadhaaga Enakku Sarikkattinaar.
21 karththarudaiya Vazhigalaik Kaikkonduvandhen; Naan En Dhevanukkuth Dhurogampanninadhillai.
22 avarudaiya Niyaayangalaiyellaam Enakku Munbaaga Niruththinen; Avarudaiya Piramaanangalai Naan Thallippodavillai.
23 avar Munbaaga Naan Manavunmaiyaayirundhu, En Thurkkunaththukku Ennai Vilakkik Kaaththukkonden.
24 aagaiyaal Karththar En Needhikkum, Thammudaiya Kangalukku Munnirukkira En Kaigalin Suththaththirkum Thakkadhaaga Enakkup Balanaliththaar.
25 thayavullavanukku Neer Thayavullavaraagavum, Uththamanukku Neer Uththamaraagavum;
26 punidhanukku Neer Punidharaagavum, Maarupaadullavanukku Neer Maarupadugiravaraagavum Thondruveer.
27 dhevareer Sirumaippatta Janaththai Ratchippeer; Mettimaiyaana Kangalaith Thaazhththuveer.
28 dhevareer En Vilakkai Etruveer; En Dhevanaagiya Karththar En Irulai Velichchamaakkuvaar.
29 ummaale Naan Oru Senaikkul Paaindhupoven; En Dhevanaale Oru Madhilaith Thaanduven.
30 dhevanudaiya Vazhi Uththamamaanadhu; Karththarudaiya Vasanam Pudamidappattadhu; Thammai Nambugira Anaivarukkum Avar Kedagamaayirukkiraar.
31 karththaraiyallaamal Dhevan Yaar? Nammudaiya Dhevanaiyandrik Kanmalaiyum Yaar?
32 ennaip Balaththaal Idaikatti, En Vazhiyai Sevvaippaduththugiravar Dhevane.
33 avar En Kaalgalai Maangaludaiya Kaalgalaippolaakki, Ennudaiya Uyarthalangalil Ennai Niruththugiraar.
34 vengala Villum En Puyangalaal Valaiyumpadi, En Kaigalai Yuththaththirkup Pazhakkuvikkiraar.
35 ummudaiya Ratchippin Kedagaththaiyum Enakkuth Thandheer; Ummudaiya Valadhukaram Ennaith Thaangugiradhu; Ummudaiya Kaaruniyam Ennaip Periyavanaakkum.
36 en Kaalgal Vazhuvaadhapadikku, Naan Nadakkira Vazhiyai Agalamaakkineer.
37 en Saththurukkalaip Pinthodarndhu Avargalaip Pidippen; Avargalai Nirmoolamaakkum Varaikkum Thirumben.
38 avargal Ezhundhirukkamaattaadhapadikku, En Paadhangalinkeezh Vizhaththakkadhaaga Avargalai Vettinen.
39 yuththaththirku Neer Ennaip Balaththaal Idaikatti, Enmel Ezhumbinavargalai En Keezh Madangappannineer.
40 naan En Pagaignarai Sangarikkumpadiyaaga, En Saththurukkalin Pidariyai Enakku Oppukkoduththeer.
41 avargal Kooppidugiraargal, Avargalai Ratchippaar Oruvarumillai; Karththarai Nokkik Kooppidugiraargal, Avargalukku Avar Uththaravu Kodukkiradhillai.
42 naan Avargalaik Kaatrumugaththile Parakkira Thoolaaga Idiththu, Therukkalilulla Setraippol Avargalai Erindhupodugiren.
43 janangalin Sandaigalukku Neer Ennaith Thappuviththu, Jaadhigalukku Ennaith Thalaivanaakkugireer; Naan Ariyaadha Janangal Ennai Sevikkiraargal.
44 avargal En Saththaththaik Kettavudane Enakkuk Keezhppadigiraargal; Anniyarum Enakku Ichchagampesi Adangugiraargal.
45 anniyar Munaivizhundhupoi, Thangal Arangalilirundhu Thaththalippaaip Purappadugiraargal.
46 karththar Jeevanullavar; En Kanmalaiyaanavar Thudhikkappaduvaaraaga; En Ratchippin Dhevan Uyarndhiruppaaraaga.
47 avar Enakkaagap Pazhikkup Pazhivaangi, Janangalai Enakkuk Keezhppaduththugira Dhevanaanavar.
48 avare En Saththurukkalukku Ennai Vilakki Viduvikkiravar; Enakku Virodhamaai Ezhumpugiravargalmel Ennai Neer Uyarththi, Kodumaiyaana Manushanukku Ennaith Thappuvikkireer.
49 idhinimiththam Karththaave, Jaadhigalukkulle Ummaith Thudhiththu, Ummudaiya Naamaththirku Sangeedham Paaduven.
50 thaam Erpaduththina Raajaavukku Magaththaana Ratchippai Aliththu, Thaam Abishegampannina Thaaveedhukkum Avan Sandhadhikkum Sadhaakaalamum Kirubai Seygiraar.
